name: ts-mapped-event-emitter
description: Yet another event emitter written in typescript.

scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:esm: rm -rf lib/module && tsc --declaration false --module es6 --outDir lib/module
scripts.build:cjs: rm -rf lib/commonjs && tsc --declaration false --module commonjs --outDir lib/commonjs

author: Dominic Go <dominicstop@gmail.com> (https://github.com/dominicstop)
